repairedDockerfile:
FROM centos:centos6 
MAINTAINER Chris West <support@cartesian.com> 
RUN rpm -ivh http://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppetlabs-release-el-6.noarch.rpm 

# clean up the package list 
RUN yum update -y 
RUN yum clean all 

# install deps needed by Beaker 
RUN yum install -y sudo openssh-server openssh-clients curl ntpdate && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

# install common deps for services 
RUN yum install -y git java-1.7.0-openjdk tar unzip vixie-cron && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

# install ruby 1.9.3 via SCL (used by some services) 
RUN yum install -y centos-release-SCL scl-utils && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum install -y ruby193 && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

# install puppet agent 
RUN yum install -y puppet && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
